entry.title: $2599 // Natural Light, Dishwasher ":" Stone Countertops, Central A/C
entry.content:
text Vaner at show contact info and mention the ID#16337 from this ad.

1.5 Bed / 1.5 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Gates Av. Welcome to The Masons' Lodge. Bushwick's Newly Renovated Landmark. Don't miss your chance to live in a historical building. Many different layouts available. Apartments feature Natural Light, Dishwasher, Stone Countertops, Central A/C, Video Intercom. Common Courtyard & Roof Decks with Epic Views, Laundry, Gym & Game Room in the building. 20 Minutes to Manhattan via the J Train at Gates 1 Block on Broadway and surrounded by neighborhood amenities, galleries, restaurants, coffee shops & bars.

entry.title: $2400 // ///////////////Large gut renovated 2 bed apt in prime bushwick////////
entry.content:
Massive 2 bedroom 2 full bathroom apt in prime bushwick.

Spacious living room, Island kitchen, 2 large bedrooms both on opposite sides of apt, and 2 entrances as well. Gut renovated apt with modern finishes, stainless steel appliances, heat & hot water included, central air / heat system and a shared yard. Short 3 min walk to central M and 2 blocks from the jefferson L

Bring your pets long too. Only first & security. Contact 347nine,five one- twenty eight 7 nine to view and include this ad. Must have good income & credit move in this week.
